title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Advanced Anesthesiology Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and basic anesthesiology theory
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Using anesthesia simulation equipment, perform patient monitoring and emergency response procedures with over 80% accuracy
Evaluate and improve non-technical competencies (communication, leadership) in team-based simulation scenarios
Through simulation debriefing, learners can analyze their performance outcomes and develop future improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
